title: An excellent conceited tragedie of Romeo and Iuliet As it hath been often (with great applause) plaid publiquely, by the right Honourable the L. of Hunsdon his Seruants.
author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Danter [and Edward Allde?],
notes: Second printer's name conjectured by STC. "Danter pr[inted]. only quires A-D".
Running title reads: The most excellent tragedie of Romeo and Iuliet.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
